txt.en: Look for signs of the Company
Rinneldor has asked you to seek out Ruidhriel who stands watch at the Redhorn Gate.

'Hail, stranger! It is good to see a friendly face in times such as these, but what brings you here?

'Rinneldor has sent aid as I had hoped! Caradhras is troubled; something has caused great unease upon his slopes. His winds are cold and biting, and I fear for any who have dared to tread upon him when he is in such a fey mood.

'I cannot leave my post, but perhaps you could travel to the mountain's lower slopes and <rgb=#FF0000>look</rgb> for signs of the Company? Travel north-east to the Redhorn Gate and look for any signs of them where the trees and snows meet.'

The Redhorn Gate lies to the north-east of Ruidhriel's camp.\n\nRuidhriel has asked you to go up into the Redhorn Gate and <rgb=#FF0000>look</rgb> for signs of the Company where the snow and trees begin.
'An avalanche? We can only hope that the Company was not on the mountain when it happened.\n\n'If they did brave the pass, no enemies will follow now. Thank you for your help, [placeholder].'
Ruidhriel is south and west of the Redhorn Gate, near the Burnt Tor.\n\nYou should return to Ruidhriel and tell her what you found.
'Travel north-east into the Redhorn Gate and <rgb=#FF0000>look</rgb> for signs of the Company where the snow and trees meet.'
'Caradhras is no place for the unwary.'
Look for signs of the Company
